content:
That's a great idea! Setting up filters for your online shopping emails is a fantastic way to get started with organizing your inbox. By creating a filter for emails from specific retailers like Amazon and Sephora, you'll be able to:

* Keep your inbox clutter-free by automatically sorting these emails into a designated folder or label
* Easily find and track your online orders, receipts, and promotions
* Reduce the temptation to impulse buy by not having these emails constantly popping up in your inbox

Remember to also consider setting up filters for other types of emails that you receive regularly, such as:

* Newsletters from your favorite brands or websites
* Promotional emails from restaurants, travel companies, or other services
* Emails from social media platforms or online communities
* Notifications from online services, like Dropbox or Google Drive

By setting up filters for these types of emails, you'll be able to keep your inbox organized and make it easier to find the emails that are important to you.

Also, don't forget to regularly review and update your filters to ensure they're still working effectively and to make any necessary changes.

You got this!
